description: A former government research facility turned into a frozen and burning wasteland, split between ice and fire. Site of Caesar Clown's experiments and the conclusion of the Punk Hazard arc.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Arrives on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo descends onto Punk Hazard to confront the G-5 Marines and search for Law.
keyEvents.significance: The island becomes the site of a major confrontation between Doflamingo, Smoker, and Kuzan.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines Attacked
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo uses Conqueror's Haki and his Parasite technique on the G-5 Marines stationed on Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the danger that remained on the island even after the Straw Hats departed.

keyEvents.title: Kuzan Appears on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Former Admiral Kuzan mysteriously appears on the island to save Smoker.
keyEvents.significance: Raises questions about why Kuzan was on Punk Hazard and his current activities.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using Adam Wood. A brigantine-sloop with a lion figurehead and powered by Cola energy.

keyEvents.title: Departs Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny sails away from Punk Hazard with the Straw Hats, Law, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke aboard, heading toward Dressrosa.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the transition from the Punk Hazard arc to the journey toward Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Navigates Sea Slope
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny encounters and successfully navigates a dramatic sea slope in the New World.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous nature of New World seas and Nami's navigation skills.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Reveals Plan on the Sunny
keyEvents.description: Luffy explains the alliance's plan to defeat Kaidou to the crew aboard the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the setting for the major revelation of the alliance's true goals.
